column.name: leaf_
column.Comment: 叶子节点(0:树枝节点;1:叶子节点)

column.name: menu_type
column.Comment: 菜单类型(0:CURD;1:系统菜单;2:业务菜单;)

column.name: is_show
column.Comment: 叶子节点(0:树枝节点;1:叶子节点)

column.name: order_is_send
column.Comment: 客户下订单时是否给商家发短信

column.name: pay_is_send
column.Comment: 客户付款时是否给商家发短信

column.name: send_goods_is_send
column.Comment: 商家发货时是否给客户发短信

column.name: regist_is_send
column.Comment: 用户注册时是否给客户发短信

column.name: advice_goods_is_send
column.Comment: 用户付款后是否给客户发收货验证码

column.name: role_type
column.Comment: 角色类型(1:业务角色;2:管理角色 ;3:系统内置角色)

column.name: user_type
column.Comment: 用户类型(1普通用户2管理员3系统用户)
